titleStmt.title: A copy of verses presented to all his loving masters and mistrisses, in the town of Lambeth, by Thomas Ouldman, bel-man.
titleStmt.author: Ouldman, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Good people all, both old and young,".
A collection of short verses on various themes.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
